Details: Gain a new combat feat and a new exploration feat.
0 AP 2 essence charges with 3 tile range. Can cast into weapon. Charge not lost when you miss. Can only cast 1 per turn.
After you hit with a charge, can pay 2 essence to chain to a new target within 2 tiles. Roll a new attack.
After you hit a creature with an attack, you may pay 1 essence to teleport into an empty adjacent tile.
Downtime activity to draw on source of power.
Increase one Attribute of your choice by 1.
Gain a new combat feat and a new exploration feat.
At the start of each of your turns, swap polarity. Alternates between advantage on basic attacks and advantage on special attacks.
Draw twice as many random ingredients and recipes to to select from when using Enchant, Devise or Harvest.
Increase one Attribute of your choice by 1.
Gain a new combat feat and a new exploration feat.
Immediately after you enter death's door, immediately teleport to a tile of your choice within range 4.
The first time each rest that you would die due to exhaustion, instead don't.
Increase one Attribute of your choice by 1.
Gain a new combat feat and a new exploration feat.
The enchantment point total of gear that you can equip is increased by 6.
